name: aeroflow
description: Truly lazily computed reactive data flows with rich set of pure functional operators and async support.
keywords: ES6, fluent, async, reactive, functional, FRP, LINQ
author: Denis Vlassenko <denis_vlassenko@epam.com>

scripts.all: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run document
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run minify
scripts.compile: npm run compile-library && npm run compile-library-es6 && npm run compile-tests && npm run compile-tests-es6
scripts.document: node_modules/.bin/jsdoc2md src/aeroflow.js > doc/readme.md --global-index-format dl --member-index-format grouped --module-index-format grouped --name-format code --param-list-format list --property-list-format list --sort-by name
scripts.lint: npm run lint-library && npm run lint-tests
